General.Name: Guangdong Piano Customized Furniture Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Piano Customized Furniture Co., Ltd. operates in the home furnishing industry in China. It offers storage cabinets, whole house customization products, finished furniture, and door wall products. The company offers its products through stores. The company was formerly known as Zhongshan Xinshanchuan Industrial Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

2.Name: Ms. Chong  Wang
2.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board, Sec. to the Chairman & Operations Mang.
